summary: This document is a chain of emails from December 6-7, 2019, between law enforcement personnel discussing investigative leads related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes a discussion of license plate tracking, a Facebook subpoena return, and an insurance claim report for an individual named Scott Borgerson, suggesting efforts to locate Maxwell or her associates.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The primary subject of the investigative discussion; her whereabouts and potential use of fake accounts are being analyzed.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: An individual whose personal automobile insurance claim from 2018 is detailed in the report, including his address, DOB, and vehicle (2007 Cadillac Escalade).

persons.name: Detective
persons.role: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force member
persons.context: The author of several emails discussing license plate tracking, Facebook subpoena results, and coordination with Boston PD.

connections.description: Borgerson's insurance claim and vehicle information are being reviewed in the context of an investigation potentially related to locating Maxwell.
The detective is actively investigating Maxwell's potential movements, online activity, and associates.

events.title: Email discussion on Maxwell investigation
events.description: Law enforcement exchanges emails discussing tracking license plates associated with a person of interest, Facebook subpoena results, and an insurance claim for Scott Borgerson.

events.title: Scott Borgerson vehicle collision
events.description: An insurance claim is filed for a collision involving Scott Borgerson's 2007 Cadillac Escalade in Manchester, MA.

keyFacts: Law enforcement was actively tracking vehicle registrations and license plates in late 2019 as part of the investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's whereabouts.
A Facebook subpoena was executed, but the results (with IP addresses in Miami and Virginia) were deemed unlikely to be accounts used by Maxwell, even as fakes.
An insurance claim report for Scott Borgerson, including his personal details and a 2007 Cadillac Escalade, was reviewed in the investigative context.
Coordination between NYPD/FBI task forces and Boston PD was discussed regarding license plate reader (LPR) hits.
